reasoning_log: The matching process prioritized unique architectural features first (hallway, staircase, balcony access). Desc_1 (Hallway with half-height tiles) matched Image_1. Desc_3 (Staircase) matched Image_3. Desc_11 (Bedroom with balcony door/security bars) matched Image_11. The four bathroom descriptions (Desc_5, Desc_7, Desc_9, Desc_12) were differentiated based on relative size and storage features: Desc_5 (Spacious) was assigned to Image_5 (widest view). Desc_9 (Better storage) was assigned to Image_9 (large vanity and glass shelf). Desc_12 (Tight space) was assigned to Image_7 (most compact sink/toilet arrangement). Desc_7 (Medium space) was assigned to the remaining Image_12. The four remaining bedrooms (Desc_6, Desc_10, Desc_13) were visually almost identical (empty rooms with wood floors and similar windows), so they were assigned sequentially to the remaining images (Image_6, Image_10, Image_13) based on structural similarity.

matching_result_list.evidence: Long corridor/hallway (玄關／走廊) featuring white marble floor and half-height marble wainscoting (牆面半高磁磚).
Very small bathroom (小浴室) containing only a toilet and a compact sink/vanity, confirming '空間偏小' and '收納不足'.
Clear view of a staircase (樓梯間) with marble steps and a wooden handrail, showing a half-flight design and wood flooring nearby.
Large, empty room with a wide window providing excellent natural light (採光良好), typical of a main living space (客廳／公共空間).
The largest bathroom view, showing significant space between the toilet, vanity, and shower enclosure, matching '空間寬裕' and '乾濕分離'.
Standard empty bedroom (臥室一) with wood flooring and a window with security bars, matching the generic bedroom tags.
Dry/wet bathroom with a large curved sink/vanity, fitting the description of '空間中等' better than the tighter options.
Large room with both a wide window and a separate glass door leading outside, indicating connection to a balcony/utility space (陽台連接客廳空間) with '採光極佳'.
Bathroom featuring a large sink/vanity and a glass shelf above the toilet, providing the best visible storage ('收納較佳') among the dry/wet options.
Standard empty bedroom (臥室二) with wood flooring and a window with security bars, matching the generic bedroom tags.
Bedroom featuring a large door with security mesh/bars (安全鐵窗與鐵門), confirming '帶陽台出入口'.
Dry/wet bathroom with a very small rectangular sink and tight placement of fixtures, matching '空間中等偏緊'.
Standard empty bedroom (臥室四) with wood flooring and a window with security bars, matching the generic bedroom tags.
